job.title: Machine Learning/ML Engineer
job.description: <p><strong><em>Machine Learning/ML Engineer</em></strong></p><p><strong><em>Cool Minds LLC</em></strong></p><p><strong><em>Location: Austin, TX (Remote until Covid) and Candidates who can work in PST will be given the preference</em></strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong><em>Job Requirements:</em></strong></p><ul><li>5+ years of industry experience or a PhD and in addition, minimum 2 years industry experience in applied Machine learning.</li><li>Strong coding skills in Python/Java/Scala or equivalent</li><li>Experience with distributed data processing tools like Hive, Spark, Airflow and popular ML frameworks like Tensorflow or Pytorch is preferred</li><li>Solid understanding of engineering best practices and complexities of models in production</li><li>Experience developing and productionizing machine learning models is a plus</li><li>Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, Spark is a plus</li><li>Experience with distributed data processing tools like Hive, Spark, Airflow is a plus</li><li>Industry experience building end-to-end Machine Learning Infrastructure a bigplus.</li></ul>
